snippet.title: I Like You So Much, You’ll Know It (我多喜欢你，你会知道) - OST A Love So Beautiful (English Cover by Tereza)
snippet.description:
My equipments & outfits: https://mycollection.shop/terezafahlevi

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/0MmaDcwBxBaQKZBuILTOlP?si=BlUzUut9QRmy2yJcoHkjAw
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/id/album/i-like-you-so-much-youll-know-it-feat-relasi-project-acoustic/1701657881?i=1701657883


Tereza & Relasi Project, performing "I Like You So Much, You’ll Know It (我多喜欢你，你会知道)" in english version

Original version of this cover:
【致我们单纯的小美好】主题曲：我多喜欢你，你会知道 - 王俊琪 | 辰希告白MV | A Love So Beautiful: Opening Theme Song (Original Version)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7I1SPKwTXJ0

Lyric adaptation of this song (English version):
I Like You So Much, You’ll Know It (Ysabelle Cuevas Version)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bS9eXS6VucU

Follow my instagram:
@tereza1969

Subscribe to Relasi Project:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCApKHYP_osy2dzWHsF6TQtA
https://www.instagram.com/relasiproject/

Video shot by @mr_ja

Audio produced by Tereza using:
Studio One 3 (Software)
AKG P220 Microphone
Focusrite Scarlett 2i2
Taylor 114CE acoustic guitar
Squier Jazz bass guitar

Video produced by Tereza using:
Sony A6000
Sony Vegas Pro 13 (Software)

Follow Tereza:
Twitter : https://twitter.com/Tereza_1969
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/tereza1969/ 
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/terezafahlevi/ 

Font I'm using on my thumbnail:
Raphtalia by Nurf Designs
https://nurfdesigns.com/raphtalia/

Lirik :

I like your eyes, you look away when you pretend not to care
I like the dimples on the corners of the smile that you wear
I like you more, the world may know but don't be scared
'Cause I'm falling deeper, baby be prepared

I like your shirt, I like your fingers, love the way that you smell
To be your favorite jacket, just so I could always be near
I loved you for so long, sometimes it's hard to bear
But after all this time, I hope you wait and see

Love you every minute, every second
Love you everywhere and any moment
Always and forever I know I can't quit you
'Cause baby you're the one, I don't know how
I love you 'til the last of snow disappears
Love you 'til a rainy day becomes clear
Never knew a love like this, now I can't let go
I'm in love with you, and now you know

I like the way you try so hard when you play ball with your friends
I like the way you hit the notes, in every song you're shining
I love the little things, like when you're unaware
I catch you steal a glance and smile so perfectly

Though sometimes when life brings me down
You're the cure my love
In a bad rainy day
You take all the worries away

Love you every minute, every second
Love you everywhere and any moment
Always and forever I know I can't quit you
'Cause baby you're the one, I don't know how
In a world devoid of life, you bring color
In your eyes I see the light, my future
Always and forever I know, I can't let you go
I'm in love with you, and now you know
I'm in love with you, and now you know

#ILikeYouSoMuchYouWillKnowIt #TerezaCover #RelasiProject
